SEARCH
Package io.papermc.paper.registry.data

Interface InstrumentRegistryEntry.Builder

All Superinterfaces:
InstrumentRegistryEntry, RegistryBuilder<MusicInstrument>
Enclosing interface:
InstrumentRegistryEntry
@Experimental @NonExtendable public static interface InstrumentRegistryEntry.Builder extends InstrumentRegistryEntry, RegistryBuilder<MusicInstrument>
A mutable builder for the InstrumentRegistryEntry plugins may change in applicable registry events.

The following values are required for each builder:

  • soundEvent(TypedKey), soundEvent(Consumer) or soundEvent(RegistryHolder)
  • duration(float)
  • range(float)
  • description(Component)

  • Method Details

    • soundEvent

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") InstrumentRegistryEntry.Builder soundEvent(TypedKey<Sound> soundEvent)
      Sets the sound event for this instrument to a sound event present in the RegistryKey.SOUND_EVENT registry.

      This will override both soundEvent(Consumer) and soundEvent(RegistryHolder)

      Parameters:
      soundEvent - the sound event
      Returns:
      this builder
      See Also:
      • soundEvent(Consumer)
      • InstrumentRegistryEntry.soundEvent()
